c
DATA SHEET
Adkins, Gale R.
Personal Data
Born October 21, 1918, Murray, Iowa
Married. No children.
World War II military service.
Wife employed in commercial radio.
Education
American Institute of Business 1934-36
Des Moines, Iowa
Creston College 1936-38
Creston, Iowa
University of Nebraska 1938-39
Lincoln, Nebraska
University of Texas
Austin, Texas
Bachelor of Science in Education 1939-40
(major: English; minors: speech, history)
University of Texas
Master of Education 1940-41
(major: education; minors: English, history)
University of Texas
Part time graduate study since 1945 1945-52
(Now finishing dissertation for Ph. D. degree)
Experience
Teacher of Social Studies
Edinburg, Texas, Intermediate School 1941-42
Teacher of Social Studies
Edinburg, Texas, Junior School 1942-43
Classification Interviewer
U. S. Army, San Antonio, Texas Summer, 1943
Commercial Engineer
Southwestern Bell Telephone Company
Austin and Corpus Christi, Texas 1943-45
Instructor in Speech
University of Texas
(Teaching Radio Program Planning, Radio
Speech, and Fundamentals of Speech) 1946-47
Teacher of Radio Workshop
University of Texas 1946-51
Assistant Director of Radio House
University of Texas 1945-52
(Administration, program planning, and
some production)
